title: VictimComputer
body:
<<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
The victim's computer.
[[Attempt to log on|VictimComputer.LoginSuccess]]
[[Step Away|VictimComputer.Logoff]]

title: VictimComputer.Emails
body:
Lets see. What should I check?
[[Inbox|VictimComputer.Emails.Inbox]]
[[Sent|VictimComputer.Emails.Sent]]
[[Deleted|VictimComputer.Emails.Deleted]]
[[Junk|VictimComputer.Emails.Junk]]
[[Step away|VictimComputer.Logoff]]

title: VictimComputer.Emails.Inbox
body:
[[From: Freeman's Highrise Ptd Ltd; Subject: This month's bond|VictimComputer.Emails.Inbox.Bond]]
[[From: Rachael Baxter; Subject: Last Chance|VictimComputer.Emails.Inbox.Threat]]
[[BACK|VictimComputer.Emails]]

title: VictimComputer.Emails.Junk
body:
There are a lot of Nigerian Princes in here.
I hope they're not involved, that's outside of my juristiction...
[[BACK|VictimComputer.Emails]]

title: VictimComputer.Emails.Inbox.Bond
body:
<<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>
"Thank you Mr Wright for your 6 month advance on your rates.. blah blah blah"
<<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
Nothing useful here.
<<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>
[[BACK|VictimComputer.Emails.Inbox]]

title: VictimComputer.Emails.Inbox.Threat
body:
<<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>
"Jacob, I'm warning you. Your announcment has not been received well by the board of directors.
Please reconsider your decision before it puts you in danger.
Regards, Rachael"
<<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
Interesting...
<<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>
<<set $rachaelIsSuspect to true>>
<<set $foundSuspects to true>>
<<set $rachelsofficeUnlocked to true>>

<<if $foundSuspects is true and $foundClues is true>>
    <<set $CanTravel to true>>
<<endif>>
[[BACK|VictimComputer.Emails.Inbox]]

title: VictimComputer.Emails.Sent.Breakup
body:
"Nora, I'm done with you. This isn't working."
"It's not you, it's me. You're nice and all, but I think we should see other people"
<<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
Wow, he broke up with this Nora person over email. Pretty rough.
I'll see if I can track down her address.
<<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>

<<set $foundSuspects to true>>
<<set $noraSuspect to true>>
<<set $norasapartmentUnlocked to true>>
<<if $foundSuspects is true and $foundClues is true>>
    <<set $CanTravel to true>>
<<endif>>

[[BACK|VictimComputer.Emails.Sent]]
